synopsis.text: With a year of experience under her belt, Aoba Suzukaze eagerly anticipates mentoring new recruits at Eagle Jump, the game company where she designs characters. However, instead of stepping into her new role as a senior, she finds herself leading the design team for their latest game. As she strives to improve her skills to match those of her idol, Ko Yagami, Aoba collaborates with a quirky team of coworkers. With the launch of "Fairies' Story 3" behind them, they now focus on creating a new game, "Peco." As Aoba navigates her challenging yet exciting new position, she grows both professionally and personally, embracing her journey in the gaming industry. This lighthearted comedy invites viewers into the daily lives of these passionate game developers, embarking on a new chapter filled with laughter, camaraderie, and creativity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
